class.name: talon_state_controller/TalonStateController
class.description: The talon state controller publishes the current talon state as a talon_state_msgs/TalonState message. The talon state controller expects a TalonStateInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: talon_config_controller/TalonConfigController
class.description: The talon config controller publishes the current talon config as a talon_state_msgs/TalonConfig message. The talon config controller expects a TalonStateInterface type of hardware interface.
